pec

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • pec.Event
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Death, Epidemic, Move, Observation, Reproduction

    public abstract class Event
extends java.lang.Object
    Event.java - An abstract class outlining all the necessary attributes and methods shared by the Events simulated on the PEC. All the events in the PEC are required to extend this class. It contains the individual it is related to, the time in which it should be simulated, and a reference to the PEC simulating it.
